scenarios.name: Token Efficiency - Long Context
scenarios.description: Test token usage efficiency with complex, multi-part queries
queries: I'm building a comprehensive e-commerce platform with user authentication using JWT, product catalog with PostgreSQL, shopping cart with Redis, payment processing with Stripe, order management with microservices, inventory tracking with Elasticsearch, and admin dashboard with React. What's the best architecture and implementation strategy?

We need to design a scalable social media application that handles user profiles and relationships, real-time messaging with WebSockets, content feed with ranking algorithms, media storage with CDN, notifications system with push notifications, analytics with event tracking, and mobile apps for iOS and Android. What technologies and patterns should we use?

I need to migrate a large monolithic application to microservices. The current system handles user management with LDAP authentication, business logic with complex workflows, data processing with batch jobs, reporting with Business Intelligence tools, REST APIs with OAuth2, and a MySQL database with complex schema. How should I approach this migration?
